prompts: Create a dark-type Pokemon with a long, serpentine body and purple scales.
I want a Pokemon that embodies stealth and has sharp pincers with a vibrant color scheme.
Generate a creature that looks like it lurks in shadows with unique blue accents on its body.
Make a Pokemon that thrives in urban environments and has a fierce personality.
Imagine a bug-like Pokemon with multiple limbs and a striking purple color.
Design a creature that is agile and cunning, featuring a mix of purple and blue tones.
Show me a Pokemon that resembles a scorpion and has a menacing yet playful demeanor.
